@telepirat: Happened to me, too. Then I realized that some of those keys are for Avast Pro and it changes the file structure. Simply go to Unistall and choose Repair. It will re-install the Firewall files. (Doesn't stop the pop-ups, though). Keep an eye out in the licenses for Pro or IS. They are mixed and labelled wrong sometimes.
